ai-cp19:1.1_0: “After the city of Kāla, in the King’s city,
ai-cp19:2.1_0: I am the son of the King,
ai-cp19:2.2_0: a good disciple of the Dhamma,
ai-cp19:3.1_0: he went to my father’s hermitage,
ai-cp19:3.3_0: On his way to my father,
ai-cp19:4.3_0: there was a tree for him.
ai-cp19:5.1_0: I took a turban on the snare.
ai-cp19:5.2_0: but after making it back again, again he returned.
ai-cp19:5.3_0: to the brāhmaṇa, having given a wealth to the brāhmaṇa,
ai-cp19:6.3_0: I’ve made a flaw because I’ve finished eating.
ai-cp19:6.4_0: and again he will come back.’
ai-cp19:7.1_0: I worshipped my mother and father,
ai-cp19:7.4_0: and I went to a charnel ground.
ai-cp19:8.4_0: if it is on the limit of the three months,
ai-cp19:9.1_0: My ethical conduct loved by me.
ai-cp19:9.2_0: but he didn’t speak about them.
ai-cp19:9.3_0: For it is beneficial that is your heart’s words,
ai-cp19:9.4_0: he uttered this statement to his words.
ai-cp19:11.1_0: So it is for the sake of ethical conduct.
ai-cp19:11.2_0: I wasn’t able to live my life.
ai-cp19:11.3_0: I gave him the going forth.
